# InvoiceFee

An object representing internal details for a fee associated with an invoice.

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Examples |
|------------|:-------------:|:-------------:|-------------|:-------------:|
| **type** |string | ☑️ | The type of fee. | | |
| **value** |number | ☑️ | The value or amount of the fee. | | |
